page.title: 18CAMBORNE TOWN BAND
page.content: {Camborne Town Band}was formed in 1896.Although the band gave concerts in the local area from 1897 onwards,it did not commence serious contesting until 1945.The band,along with Redruth,Bodmin,and St.Austell is one of the four Cornish Championship section bands.Since the 1960's the band has performed excellently and consistantly in the{National Brass {Band Championships},held at the Royal Albert Hall every year in early October.The band's current Musical Director,{'Derek Greenwood}'has been with the band since 1976 and has pushed the band to even greater heights,performing all over the world.The solo cornet{'Robert {Tanner'}won the 1982{'Best of {Brass}'soloist competition with an outstanding majority.
